import feedparser
import requests
from datetime import datetime
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

class KrebsOnSecurityReader:
    """Krebs on Security RSS Reader - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://krebsonsecurity.com'
        self.feed_url = 'https://krebsonsecurity.com/feed/'
        
    def get_latest_articles(self, limit=10):
        """Get latest articles from RSS feed (FREE!)"""
        print("📰 Krebs on Security - Latest Articles (FREE!)\n")
        
        try:
            feed = feedparser.parse(self.feed_url)
            
            if feed.entries:
                print(f"🔥 Latest {min(limit, len(feed.entries))} Articles:\n")
                
                for entry in feed.entries[:limit]:
                    print(f"📌 {entry.title}")
                    print(f"   🔗 {entry.link}")
                    print(f"   📅 {entry.get('published', 'N/A')}")
                    
                    # Extract summary
                    if hasattr(entry, 'summary'):
                        summary = BeautifulSoup(entry.summary, 'html.parser').text
                        summary = summary[:200] + '...' if len(summary) > 200 else summary
                        print(f"   📝 {summary}")
                    
                    # Categories/Tags
                    if hasattr(entry, 'tags'):
                        tags = [tag.term for tag in entry.tags]
                        print(f"   🏷️ Tags: {', '.join(tags)}")
                    
                    print()
                
                return feed.entries[:limit]
            else:
                print("No articles found in feed")
                return []
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"Error fetching feed: {e}")
            return []
